values:
Not much is going on really, everything is still peachy.
I had a work meeting in Telford yesturday and had to get the damn train...didn't get back to brum till about 17:30. And it's a good job it was yesturday, as today trees have been blown over on the rail lines and loads of people are stranded or having to get public buses. Its so windy! 
I'm at Anastasia's at the min...was having a chat and she just offered if i wanted to use the comp. She's gone out now though. Our cooker has messed up so we need a new one for the flat...we've only just got a new fridge freezer so Anastasia must be "loving us" right now lol-bless. Did i mention we finally got rid of our small TV out of the livingroom, and now we gots a widescreen?? Its heaven!!! i don't have to squint my eyes anymore to watch it!

In other news, Hayley has an eye infection (poor baby)...so i'll be nursing her till she gets better *smerks* ;)
Hayley's family came over at the weekend because it was her mum's birthday. As they were leaving her lil brother Adam wouldn't give her a hug and came out with a reply "it's not your birthday you know". So i said "well i'm not family , so do i get a hug?"...i didnt get one but i was told i could have one for my birthday next month lol. But however!! Hayleys mum replied with "don't say that...your part of the family now...we've adopted you!" and kept repeating "your part of the family now" and stuffs heheh. Made me feel good because as yal know...me and Hayleys mum never used to get along so great...now i always get a "crushing hug" when they come over :)

This weekend i have the joys of moving my old fridge freezer to a house next door, up a flight of stairs...i'll be expecting a back massage afterwards lol.
(Hayley's response "will you now!!!" ...my reply *cheeky grin*)

So that's it guys...as before...i don't know when i'll next be online so i'll reply to any emails/posts etc as soon as i can.

Love yas! xxx

Fucking love this song!

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Hd7y6A-5uTY>


<object width="425" height="350"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/Hd7y6A-5uTY"></param><param name="wmode" value="transparent"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/Hd7y6A-5uTY" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" wmode="transparent" width="425" height="350"></embed></object>

yay hayley n me live together now...she moved in on the 6th instead of the 5th but yeah...weeeeeeeeeeeeeeee. it still aint sunk in yet for both of us but its great. i have all this week off work so i can help her find a job and whatnot...n so we can spend some quality time together. but yeah...she can bloody pack for ENGLAND! my livingroom...oops...i mean OUR livingroom...was jam packed full of her stuff...the only thing she didnt pack was the kitchen sink...but she might as well have because omg lol! n now she nagging in ma ear "im not that bad" lmao. now the next big thing to go ahead is dads wedding...its gonna be great. ima so get pissed n dance all night weeeeeeeeeeeeeee lol. i'll update as soon as i can. miss and love you all. mwahz ...Ezza xxx

wow you guys....its been such a long time since i wrote on my lj. for those who don't know...i moved into my own flat (apartment) in february and have been living there alone ever since. i can't aford the net so i only check mail when i get time off work and visit dad. so so much has gone on since i last came here...one of which ma dad and sharon are getting married this september...FINALLY!!...i was well chuffed when i heard after them being engaged for 9 years its about time!!! :) and in other news hayley is moving in with me on the 5th of August. its not quite sunk in yet but i can't wait. i gotta scoot anyway...but i'll update again sometime. i miss and love you all so so much...and i think about u all alot. keep in touch peeps....email me (not junk!!!)...and i'll reply as soon as i have the chance....or you can call me or text if you have my number. i love you guys...mwahz xxxxxxxx

Hopelessness

Don't tell me what's on you're mind
I'll continue to carry on blind
Although you believe you're being kind
You're actually leaving me behind
That one person i hold close
Should be able to talk to me the most
Yet i fade...

Becoming this ghost
Eventually you'll hate me most
And i'll always be the last to know
What you feel, what emotions show
Fear the person that now you see
This former shadow...
Of you and me

I'm bored....Hayley is away tonight stayin at a friends and i'm missing her lots. Normally i'm alright...smoking takes up some of the time and what not...Now because i'm in the process of quitting theres all that spare time im not using up now and it's making my days drag. And obviously i'm getting all the side effects i normally get when i try and quit...short temper, enhanced mood swings, depression, and not knowing what to say. On several occassions while i've been tryin to quit ive gone online n people are chattin n i'm just sat staring blankly at the screen. I'll be asked a question and give a one word answer or none...n ive been goin online through bordom when really i just have nothing to say. Everyones like "you ok?"...well yeah i guess i am ok given the situation, as this is normally what happens when i quit cold turkey. Theres never a good time to quit as there is always something stressfull going on. and normally something happens to kick start me smoking again as i get agitated VERY quickly while quitting..so everyone, if i'm not with it the best advice i can give you is to back off...that way i can't lash out and also u cant piss me off in anyway. I've been smoking for over ten years...it has to stop now...so help me with it people *hugz*

I see hayley next saturday...i can't wait, i miss her so much. For my birthday it's only Hayley and Emma going now...i'm hoping nothing pops up to prevent them from coming cuz i know they wudnt let me down unless it was life or death. Both of their parents can be "bitchy" sometimes so i'm hoping they don't make hassel. If any of them cant make it i'll just cancel our plan cuz there'll be no point.
Nothing happened in concerns to the flat yet...i'm gonna call on monday if i hear nothing tomorrow.
In other news, just lately i'm becoming over-whelmingly aware that the majority of my "friends" are all "take take take" and no "give" so i've decided i'm not gonna be so generous anymore. Yes i know quite a lot of you are reading this but i don't care...you all know me well enough by now to know that i say what i think..n besides this is my journal n i'll write what i want so if yaz don't like it DONT read it. but for those of you who are reading it...you just take a moment now...and think...just how many times have i put myself out for you..even when really i shouldn't...for example im skint but i still keep my promise of doing something for yaz...how many times have i dropped my plans to spend time with yaz instead...how many times have i sat on the phone getting my ear bent and helped even tho i was either doing something important or watching my programmes! And now you think about just how many times you lot have let me down!! "oh yeah i'll do this...i'll meet you here...i'll come visit you" ...NO!!!!! you won't do that you'll give me an excuse...no YOU WON'T meet me there i get stood up, yet when u arange something i go...no YOU WON'T  come visit me because "moneys tight this week" or some other bullshit excuse..when really all you need to say is "no your not imporatant enough to spend money out on"...d'yal think my money isn't tight as well and yet i put myself out. So you sit there and think long and good just about how many times you've done that to me n how many times i HAVENT done it to you...cuz if you all can't think of any i'm sure i could make a list for every single one of yaz. So lets get that clear "friends"....i ain't puttin myself out for NONE OF YOU unless ya'll change your ways!!!!

Welps yeps, i know this is a lil late...but i've been so busy this week i just haven't had chance to update.

On the friday as i've mentioned, it was the works Christmas party and we had it at a club called "the works" which is on Broad street. I had a brilliant time...i went straight from work to meet up with my mates to go back to the hotel, jumped in the shower then got changed and went to my friends room. She straightend ma hair and what not n then we all left and stayed at the pub O'Neils for a little first. When we got there it was already in full swing even though the night was young...i was already tipsy at this stage because i'd been getting a head start at the hotel and knocked one back at O'Neils. I spend almost all night dancing away (they don't call me dancing girl for nothing-lol). I had 2 highlights of the evening. One was dancing with Toni Austin...anyone who talks to me should know that this is a girl i work with who is FUCKING GORGEOUS (lol)...n there she is shaking her ass up all on me i was like "woooooooooooooooo shake it! *slaps ass*" ROTFLMMFGDAO. Then we was country dancing to cottoneye joe...old classic hehehe. shes a sweetie. My second highlight of the evening was Helen someone else i used to work with, she was dancing with me...it was really funny cuz she kept goin to gimmie a kiss n i had to keep reminding her to give "just a peck helen!!!" LMAO. She had a really low cut dress on so i was like *wink*"love the dress chick"...n shes like "got a good look yet?" then she pulled ma head down on em like a pillow...crazy sod lmao. I was dancing with her and she knocked my glass of baileys flying so she bought me a double when she only knocked over a single...she insisted she got me another one though lol. The DJ game me a glue and a green glow light...so i was dancing around with them n then i put them down my shirt holding them in my bra while i danced...all u could see was this blue and green glow under my shirt hehehe. Anyways we all went back to the hotel about 2:30am...i had a bit more to drink then went to bed.

I woke up at 7:30 and got myself ready to go to burton to meet up with Hayley ....i was just a tad hungover ROTFLMAO. But yeah i got there and by the time id woke up properly i felt a lot better. Hayley has said what happened that day but yeah i'll run through it quick for those of you who don't read my babes journal. We meet up, got some dinner, then went to a visitor centre n i asked for a list of accomodation, but ended up booking the hotel while i was there. We went to the cinema after that to watch Narnia- the lion the witch and the warbrobe...then we checked in at the hotel around about 3pm. Then we did some "catching up" *wink wink* because we hadnt had any "alone time" together for a long time. But yeah...we spent the night "catching up" and cuddling....took a bath together (very nice bath that was too *winx*. Then we fell asleep in each others arms. I missed her so bad....i missed her even when she was right infront of me....But it felt so good to fall asleep in her arms. In the morning we checked out around 11am...we went and got something to eat and then we went to the cinema again and watched King Kong. Time flew from there and the next thing i knew i was waving her off in a taxi and i was catching a coach back to birmingham as the trains weren't running. We had an amazing weekend though...and we're definately gonna have to do it again some time.

In other news...tomorrow it'll be mine n hayleys 1 year aniversary....i CANT believe shes put up with me for so long...and yet the time has flew...doesnt feel like a year at all...and we are so much closer and stronger...and everythings still perfect...we've never argued once (only playfully)...and ...and...i dunno...shes just amazin and i'm not gonna let her slip through my fingers unless she tells me to go.

I love you Hayley!!

We're spending the 17th together either at her house or at a hotel...no distractions...nothing but me and her. Im really looking forward to it. Also this weekend coming im going to mandys for her 25th....its gonna be one hell of a night n i'm really looking forward to it, n i can't wait to see her again its been agesssssssss :) the only thing left to report is that ma angel is ill at the minute...poor baby...i really wish i could be there to comfort her n try make her feel a lil better.

Hope you get better soon my darlin...i love you :*

i wuda updated earlier but i aint had time. my mum took it very well and isn't bothered at all. At last im COMPLETELY out...no more hiding who i am and pretending to be something i'm not. It feels good...i feel "free" in a way i wasn't before...and it's great

Well as you can see from my last entry i took the hurdle of telling my older bro about my sexuality. I sat thinking about it last night...and i finally decided i'm not gonna put it off any longer...i have to tell my mum. So i wrote a letter lastnight and posted it today...which means she'll get it in the morning...and it is a COMPLETE understatement when i say that im ROYALLY FUCKING SHITTING MYSELF!!! Anyway, this is what i wrote...

Mum,
You're probably wondering why i'm writing to you when you're a phone call away. Well truth is, i need to tell you something...and i'm too much of a chicken to tell you to your face. Maybe you already guessed, but still, i'd rather you hear it from me rather than someone else if you haven't.
I'm bi, and i prefer to be with women. I've wanted to tell you for a long time, but i didn't know how you'd react and i just didn't have the bottle. If you're not happy about it then please take into consideration how long it's taken me myself to accept it. i needed to tell you though because you'd find out sooner or later, and i don't want to pretend to be something i'm not. Telling you this is probably the hardest thing i've ever had to do, so please let me know how you feel about this.
Erin x

Now i've only gotta tell mum as ive just told my older bro. i knew he'd be kewl about it but thats not the point. There was only hima nd mum left to tell so telling him was a HUGEEEEEEEEEEEEEE step for me. So peeps this is how it went :

FUCK FUCK FUCK FUCK FUCKIDY FUCK FECK!!! i gots ma face to face interview tomorrow and im bricking it!!!!!!!!!!!!!! ARGHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Well as you know, i had a very shitty holiday...And i started back at work on the Monday to have my manager call me over for a "quiet chat". He told me that i could lose my job at the end of this month or the beginning of the next because the building will probably be getting rid of all temporary staff due to the low volumes of work coming through. Its been a risk for the past couple of months now so i knew this conversation was gonna happen sooner or later. But he did bring me some good news though...he told me there was permanent jobs going on a different floor in the building and would i be interested in applying for it. I had a look at it...n said yeah, so he filled in everythin for me n sent it off monday afternoon...i didn't even have to do a thing. Apparently he said there was an opening day for it while i was on holiday so obviously i couldn't go to it...n i was worried that i'd have a lot of competition trying for the position as there was only 20 jobs going. But yeah...so i got an email on thursday telling me i had a telephone interview on friday at 1pm. At the minute ive been moved to s different floor anyway with all of the other temp staff and a lot of them where annoyed that id got an interview before them as they applied before me...so i was pretty pleased...

Friday came...my manager coached me for the interview for an hour at 10am...he even booked me a meeting room so i could take the call with no distractions- none of the other managers did that for their staff. anyway, by the time id got back to my desk there was a few people who had already had their interviews, so i asked them what kind of questions they was asking and if they told them when they'd find out if they'd been successful and made it to the face to face interviews. They was told to wait 2-5 working days to find out.

12:30...the interview was approaching and i was shitting it...im much better face to face than what i am on the phone...but because id made a shitload of notes based on what my manager had told me and also the questions my friends told me where being asked i felt pretty confident...just very nervous. So i went to the toilet, then got a drink..n by the time i got to the meeting room my manager had left his work just to come and giv me some support...hes a great manager and if i get the job i'll miss my old group a lot...we're all really close.
Anywayyyyyyyyyy ...he talked to me right up until the phone rang and i answered it...he gave me the thumbs up on how i'd answered the phone and then left. 

It was a woman...she told me the interview would take 25 to 30 mins and that there may be a short silence after ive given each answer as she needs to type my replies and make sure she has everything. Also that there would be 3 sections of questions and that i should go on my first instinct and not take long in thinking of my replies. This made me nervous because i had to give my answers quickly. I said "just before we start, i've had some problems with my phone network is it possible to give you another number just incase we should get cut off?"..so its a good job i did that....because Hayley sent me a text message half way into the interview and it cut off the call LOL! she was askin me how it went bless but i hadn't actually finished lol. But yeah...the woman called me back and i must of completely blew her away with my answers (not being big headed but i thought i fuckin rocked with the answers i was giving her)..and she must of been impressed because she said "ok thanx alot for that Erin i have no more questions to ask...and you'll be pleased to know you've been successful up to this stage. I'm just gonna put you on hold while i see if we have the info on the face to face interviews"....n she came back n apologized because she didn't have the details yet, so she said she'd call me early next week and let me know dates etc. and that was that. 

Well i had the biggest grin on my face...i got back to my desk and everyone was like "how did it go"...by the end of the day almost everyone had had their interview...and out of all of them...i was THE ONLY ONE who was told straight away on the phone that i'd made it to the next stage....everyone else was told to wait 2-5 working days to find out. Can you imagine how amazin that made me feel? I musta been smilling like a cheshire cat all day lol!!!

So yeps, im pleased about that...i'll let everyone know what else happens

I've decided i can't put it off any longer....i've gotta go visit my mum, and i'm going at the weekend on friday after work. I really really don't wanna go...but i have to. Mums been askin me when i'm gonna visit again for ages, and so has Christopher. 
I was talking to them on Tuesday at work, mum put Chris on the phone n he said "when are you coming? n when can i come to birmingham u said i could!!"....i silently cried as i said "i'll come over this weekend if you like"...he was so excited...and i was petrified regreting i'd said it as soon as i had. I would bring him here if i could because before i moved here dad and Sharon said it would be ok to have him over sometimes...but of course they've gone back on their word..just like with a lot of the stuff they said before i moved here. 

I don't want them to feel like i'm not visiting because i don't wanna see them...i do...i really miss them...i don't let on how much moving affected me...that was my life...it was all i'd ever known...my friends....my family. I just couldn't stand the pain anymore...there was too many bad memories...too much getting used by my friends who only wanted to see me when they felt like it or when they wanted something....too many arguements with my family. I couldn't stand it.

I knew leaving would be hard...but i knew living here would be just as hard too. I didn't feel wanted at all back at my mums....dad and sharon "tricked" me into feeling wanted..which soon disappeared once i'd actually moved in...i just knew it would be hard because i don't know my dad...i never have and i never will. No matter how hard i try to get close to him it never works. I can't even hold a simple conversation with him...it lasts for less than a minute n then we just sit there with an awkard silence. As for Sharon....all shes been doing for the past couple of months is make me feel bad about myself. Making sarcastic comments that just degrade me and put me down all the time. Lately shes doing it with absolutely anything i say. Just making me feel like nothing...worthless...maybe i am...but she doesn't have to rub it in!! i don't need someone to tell me i'm worthless....i have a fucking mirror for that. I can't even say anything about it...i know it'd just get turned on me to make me look like i'm the one getting the wrong end of the stick by taking things too much to heart, or instead there would be a huge arguement and i'd have nowhere to go...because i definately can't go back to Widnes, not even if i wanted to, not now. 

I feel so alone right now....i am alone. I know i have friends online and what not that will say they are there for me...and i know they are....its just not the same though is it. I wake up...i go to work...i come home to Sharon making me feel like shit and my dad just sat quiet...go to my room...stay there all night, either just listening to music...watchin tv, or chatting on here....then i sleep. Its pathetic...im pathetic. I'm just a prisoner in my room all over again..alone with nothing.

I can't stop thinking about going to visit mum though, and everytime i do i just cry. I dunno what i'ma do if i see him there...i seriously don't want to go, despite the fact that i do really wanna see my mum and Chris.
I'm so lost right now :(

I'm sleepin at Hayley's this Saturday if i haven't mentioned already (don't think i have)...n i can't wait to see her. I can't wait to hold her its gonna be so good. I need to talk to her though (nothing bad...its all good-hehe)...n i gots her prezzie...well...more like...erm...a symbol? (ive been confusing her about her prezzie all week so she won't guess what it is, or what i wanna talk to her about-lol!)....i remember when i first mentioned that i wanted to talk to her....all her friends have been tryin to help her guess...thinkin stuff like pooety, storys, marriage-lol. None of them are right tho....ones kinda but at the same time completely not lol (just to confuse you all as well-lol!!!!!) I hope she likes it though. Oh how i wish it was Saturday now n would never change days hehehe....

I love you Hayley :* xxxxxx

Well as most will know (i think)....me and Mandy are back on speaking terms im glad to say....Even though if i'm honest i'm still very hurt by what was said...i think its gonna take me quite a while to get over that, but i'm not one to actually let it "get in the way" of starting to put things right, if that makes sense to anyone at all.

I'd like to tell you all apart from that everythings ok...and that i'm ok...but in reality i know im not. Over the last couple of weeks i've been on edge...desperate to do something stupid...i nearly did a few times. Took a few tablets, like about 6 or something at a time....then stopped...knowing i can't take anymore...all though a big part of me wanted to. Just enough to numb the pain for a little while...even though my stomach is severely damaged from past experiences so it isn't doing me any good anyway. I know in my heart though i could never do that to Hayley...she means to much to me to leave behind. I'd like to say i wouldn't do it because of losing family but i'd be lying. Right now and for quite a while Hayley has been the single most important person in my life, which is why i have to make it through this. I have to stay strong for her.

I'm not a perfect person as she seems to think...i make mistakes and continue to do so everyday, and for this i only have myself to blame...hopefully i'll find the strength to be stronger and learn by my experiences so i don't find myself walking a "wrong path"...and hopefully when i have kids of my own i can show them not to go wrong in situations where i have.

I've had a lot of time on my hands to think lately....it seems all i can bring myself to think about is the past. Tryin to figure out the whys...trying to figure out how to let it go...but i believe this will be an impossible task.

I've been thinking about my childhood....where all my problems seemed to begin. Wondering why my dad was so violent...wondering why he is so different now.....wondering why he couldn't change back then but has now. Why?
I wonder why it was made so obvious that my brother was the "favorite"...why in a sense i was emotionally punished by my family for that and still continue to receive the "punishment" today. Am i really that....that worthless?
I wonder why i turned to "God" when i was younger for "love"...latching on to something i no longer believe in for all those years...trying everything i possibly could just to be noticed...to feel...wanted...excepted? All i ever wanted is for just once...for my family to say they are proud of me...that they love me. Instead i was pushed away...never shown any compassion..any love. Now today i find myself latching onto any love i'm given...trying so hard to give love myself in order to receive it....kind of like im reaching out to get what i was never given. But it can't change my past...I can never get back those years...can't change them...can't seem to change the relationships i now have with my family. It comes to something when i can't even give my mum a hug...or tell her i love her despite the fact that shes emotionally scared me with the things she's said, or hold a simple conversation with my dad...just sit there with the awkward silences.....knowing that this is the way its always going to be.
Why is what i do never enough? Why do they constantly find anything to say in order to put me down in someway? I feel so....empty?
Why is it that i'd always be the one people put down at school? I never did any wrong to them...i didn't do a thing. When your put down so so much by everyone around you, the bad stuff is easier to believe. When your put down enough you DO believe it..and it doesn't matter what anyone says you always will. Why is that? *sighs*

I never usually speak about any of this stuff...unless its in my own diary...this is the only diary i have now so thats why i won't use detail....i don't need to write detail when everything is fresh in my memory like it was yesterday....like a splinter in my mind that i can't reach.......like a cut on the roof of your mouth that would heal if you could only stop tonguing it. I feel....ashamed of....my life...my existence. I feel so...useless/worthless/invisible. But i smile...i laugh...i joke...i be the person people expect me to be....have hidden behind a "false guard" for so many years now that it just comes naturally to act the way i do.....so much that i don't know who i am anymore. Is this the real me? Or is my life just one big act? dreams, reality....i can't distinguish between the two anymore. And all i feel i can do is sit being pathetic crying about it...tearing myself to pieces because i dunno what else to do. 

"Why".....the question we will never truly be able to answer it seems. Everyone has a "why"....everyone has an "empty" hole in there life that they can't answer...and because they can't answer it they ask "why" all over again. Life it seems, is just a never ending "why" until we die...Then the people we leave behind ask "why"...why now? Does any of this make sense to anyone?

My mind right now...i know i'm "not well"...i know my depression is slowly getting worse. i'm always depressed up to a certain degree..i can't help it. But i've been down this path before...i know where it leads...I can't handle this...i don't want to...and in the same breath...i have to.

Hayley is on holiday at the minute. I can't stop looking at her pictures...can't stop thinking about her. Everytime i think about her, it gives me somewhat "strength"....i feel this...this serge of...emotion....of love...so overwhelming that i could cry. She makes me wanna do right in life...makes me wanna be a better person. I'd be so lost without her right now. I can't even begin to imagine my life without her being a part of it anymore.
I'm so afraid of "pushing her away" unintentionally. A lot of people fall in to the trap of treating people the way they were when they were younger without even realising it...which is why i try to encourage Hayley to talk about anything with me, in the hope that if i ever did get that way she'd tell me. I'd never want her to feel unwanted...or like we've drifted apart....never.

I love her so much. I just hope in the time ahead i can find the strength to carry on... for both of us.....

Right now i'm stoned (yay)...BUT! I've been chatting to Mandy and i asked her the same question i know alot of other people have asked..."why do you get the munches EVERY time your stoned? And when you eat why does it taste 874567345637465365 times better when your high?"

And i've just been sat here thinking about it n yeah....

Sight - things become better looking, more beautiful

Hearing - Music and shit sounds better

Touch - Things feel softer and nicer (ever get this?)

Smell - My skunk always smells better when high.. ahhh

Taste - Food tastes much better when you got the munchies...

Phsychic - "supernatural" experiences when high. Includedin ESP, OBE, Auras, etc.
crazy shit

For a few weeks now ive had this feelin....not good....

All my friends know that i have this sort of "sixth sense" thing...for example...in the past i've had a bad feeling that something has been wrong with one of my friends and i've called them to see if they are ok, and they are in tears or about to do sumat stupid...and i always manage to call at just the right time. Or for another example...with my friend Nikki...she walked out of her house once after an arguement and left me there...i don't know the area in which she lives well so the girl i know from next door walked around with me while i looked for her...n i was like "she's over there...in the park"...and the girl was like "nah she never goes the park...lets look over here"....n i was like "trust me, she's in the park" and in the distance i was like "shes there on the bench"...and shes all like "nah that ain't Nikki" ...but it was...and somehow i just knew she was there and where she'd be.

...Anyway...back to this feeling i have. I'm not gonna go into detail on who its about...those who know me well will know who i'm talking about anyway...But its about someone from my past, that i have no way of escaping this year..and i have this bad feeling that something is gonna happen...and its getting stronger everyday, so i know its gonna happen soon. All this "feeling" is bringing back memories...flash backs...my nightmares are becoming worse and even more frequent...i'm constantly on edge...constantly crying, worrying. A year or so ago i would have done something stupid by now with all the thoughts going on in my head...but i can't do that now...i don't want to, because i have someone too important to lose...someone i couldn't leave behind despite the emotional pain i'm going through at the minute.

Its driving me crazy...putting on this "emotional front" all the time, so people think everythings ok....but ive had to do it for years, it comes natural now to be "happy"....but when i'm alone, everythings so much different. I just feel so helpless right now...there's nothing i can do...and i know the feeling won't go away until whatever i'm waiting for happens...and if its what i think it is, this is only the beginning....and everything will become a lot worse.

I'm trying not to let it get me down at the minute...because it hasn't happened yet...but it will, and thats for certain...and its gonna happen VERY soon...

I dunno what to do :'(

At work there's this girl called Emma.....She has to fetch new applications for the mortgages everyday to me so i can sign them and get them prepared to be batched to the underwriters. And since the first day we met...she has reminded me of....someone i used to know....someone i was very much in love with, but distance between us, tore us apart, and she couldn't handle it anymore...so i had to let her go. And as the months have gone past i keep seeing more and more of this person in her.

Her smile, her looks, her attitude, her sense of hummor...everything. It makes me smile to remember the old times with "the girl i used to know"..reminded of her through Emma. It's not that i'm still in love with this girl...it's not that at all, obviously i care about her but i love my angel. I think it just gets to me that....with someone i was so close to...intimately and emotionally attatched to...and someone that was always one of my bestfriends...to slip out of my life so easily and vanish...It feels weird. I never get to talk to her anymore, to see how she is..and i just miss having a laugh and a joke with her. But even if i could talk to her now...obviously the whole atmosphere between us has changed because we used to be so close....we don't "interact" with each other the same as what we used to...so it makes it a lot harder to strike conversation.

Anyone guessed who i'm talking about yet? I think one or two may have figured it out...

yes....its Britty.

Britty chicka....you gotta keep in touch more girlie, i miss yah *hugz*
